title: Between the Scenes -The Trump-Kardashian Meeting Proves We're Living in an Alternate Universe
itunes:title: Between the Scenes -The Trump-Kardashian Meeting Proves We're Living in an Alternate Universe
description:
Kim Kardashian successfully lobbied President Trump to pardon convicted great-grandmother Alice Johnson during a surreal meeting at the White House.
